name: Kill The Monster
description: Thousands of nasty insects have taken over our homes. The only thing we can do is to take up our weapons and destroy...
minimum_requirements: OS: windowsXP SP3/win7/win8/win10 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windowsXP SP3/win7/win8/win10 Processor: Intel Core i5 5775 or AMD Ryzen 5 or greater Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 980Ti or AMD Radeon RX 480 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
